Edit: Well all 100 codes got used super fast! But you can still sign up normally and it’s still totally worth it!

In this video I build a pretty cool siege tower for tabletop gaming. I plan on using it for Dungeons and Dragons, but really you could use it for all sorts of skirmish games. 

Some specific items used in this build:

Rotary tool.....you are going to want a rotary tool. Here's a link to some really affordable ones that are more than enough for hobby needs.
(USA) https://amzn.to/3dtrkB7
(Canada) https://amzn.to/3eJ0dlV
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2CF4OVZ
(UK) https://amzn.to/2Ah4R95
